com.conquestrpg.game

Class RPGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationAdapter
      • com.conquestrpg.game.RPGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationListener, com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor

    public class RPGame
extends com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationAdapter
implements com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor
    This class is the heart of COA, it has the main features that makes the game run, including: maps, player, titlescreen, NPC and monster implementation, and screens.

      • isCollision

        private boolean isCollision(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Rectangle playerBox)
        Method for collision detection. Player will bounce back if hit into a collision layer.
        Parameters:
        playerBox -

      • movePlayer

        public void movePlayer()
        Method controls player movement with U/D/L/R arrow keys implemented. Arrow keys can be held down for continuous movement.
